General.Name: Accuracy Shipping Limited
General.Description: Accuracy Shipping Limited provides third party logistics solutions worldwide. The company offers logistics services, including transportation, distribution, freight forwarding, clearing and forwarding, custom house clearance, warehousing, and other value-added services. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Anjar, India.
General.Address: ASL House, Plot No 11, Anjar, India, 370110
